name: Molecular Warfare
description:
Molecular Warfare is a top-down shooter with beautiful graphics.

An excellent dynamic shooter with 2D top-down graphics, which has many maps, several modes, various types of weapons. Do not let you get bored with a lot of maps for different modes such as: Island, Port, Cave, Village, Warehouse, and many more.
The game also has a training mode that will allow you to improve your shooting skills, test different types of weapons.

Why is it worth downloading and playing the game?
Firstly, beautiful and pleasant graphics, secondly, convenient controls, and thirdly, constant updates with new content :)

Come into Molecular Warfare, upgrade your skills,
earn a level and enjoy!
